summary: An lore-friendly HD 2k retexture of the Dragon Priest Masks and their hoods.  Resolution options are available.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]This mod replaces the drab vanilla textures of the Dragon Priest Masks and Hoods with some real HD textures taken from high definition, real-life pictures.  Everything looks like they should have been textured this way in the first place.[/size]

[b][i][u]Info:
[/u][/i][/b]- Cleaned and optimized with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12801/?][color=#0563c1][color=#6d9eeb][size=3][b]Optimizer Textures[/b][/size][/color][/color][/url].
- This mod does not touch the stats of the masks and does not add any items to the game.  It retextures the masks only.
- Resolution options are available.
- To update, just overwrite all files.  If you want to keep some of your own textures, just don't overwrite those specific ones.

[center][img]http://i58.tinypic.com/2r432xl.jpg[/img][/center]
[b][i][u]Compatibility:[/u][/i][/b] 
- Compatible with all mods that do not effect the textures of the masks.

[u][i][b]Requirements:[/b][/i][/u]
- Latest version of Skyrim.

[u][i][b]Installation:[/b][/i][/u] 
Use nexus or manually drop the texture files into your "Data" folder.
[b] [/b]
[u][i][b]Known Issue(s):[/b][/i][/u]
- There are no known issues with this mod.

[b][i][u]Uninstallation:
[/u][/i][/b]AAAWWWWW....if you have to, just simply remove the .esp file from the "Data" folder or uninstall with nexus.

[size=3][size=2]And, as always, thank you for looking/downloading...  If you like my work, please remember to check out some of my other mods [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8497898/?tb=mods&pUp=1][font=Calibri][color=#0563c1][color=#6d9eeb][size=4][b]Here[/b][/size][/color][/color][/font][/url] :)[/size][/size]
author: typhloman
